meanings: important, significant, crucial (for/to), critical, vital (for/to), weighty, (미래에 영향을 미치는) momentous

vlive.korean: 원래 그런 게 중요하지 밀당! That's pretty important. Playing hard to get. 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫
vlive.english: That's pretty important. Playing hard to get.

vlive.korean: 밸런타인 - 마음이 중요하죠 - 그렇죠! Valentine! - The heart is important. - Right. 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫
vlive.english: Valentine! - The heart is important. - Right.

vlive.korean: 이제는 항상 예방이 중요하고 면연력! Preventative measures are important. And your immune system! 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : 모두 굿나잇!!
vlive.english: Preventative measures are important. And your immune system!

vlive.korean: 맛만 중요하면 되지 뭘... Taste is all that matters. 듣기 View video ASTRO : 따나의 얼렁뚱땅 떡국 만들기🐥🍲
맛이 중요하니? Do you care about what it tastes like? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 23 (생일 기념❤)🦊
vlive.english: Do you care about what it tastes like?

examples.korean: cognizant of the importance of the case 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 사건의 중요성을 인지하고 있는 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: We ascribe great importance to these policies. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 이들 정책에 큰 중요성을 둔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She stressed the importance of good teamwork. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 훌륭한 팀워크의 중요성을 강조했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She stressed the importance of good teamwork. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He has an inflated sense of his own importance. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 자신의 중요성을 과장되게 생각한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He has an inflated sense of his own importance. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: These thoughts were uppermost in my mind. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이러한 생각이 내 마음에서 가장 중요한 부분을 차지하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
